## Tender for Reconstruction of Marginal Wharf at Lushes Bight, NL

### Project Overview

This tender is for the reconstruction of a portion of the marginal wharf at Lushes Bight, Newfoundland and Labrador. The project requires the provision of all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials to complete the work in accordance with the specifications and drawings.

### Work Description

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* Site preparation, excavation, and demolition
* Construction of timber cribwork, fendering, and wharf blocking
* Construction of temporary works to ensure stability of adjacent Harbour Authority Building foundations
* Maintenance of existing native timber marginal wharf
* Supply and placement of scour protection
* Construction of reinforced concrete wharf deck slab
* Supply and placement of new Class "A" granular material

### Specification and Drawings

The reconstruction of the marginal wharf will be carried out in strict accordance with the specifications and accompanying drawings, which are available on the Canada Business Network website.

### Pre-Bid Site Visit

It is recommended that bidders visit the site and its surroundings to review and verify the form, nature, and extent of the work, materials necessary for completion, and means of access. Bidders should also review the health and safety requirements outlined in the specification.

### Supporting Documents

The following documents are available for viewing:

* ITT (Invitation to Tender) for Wharf Reconstruction at Lushes Bight (NL)
* Specification for Wharf Reconstruction at Lushes Bight (NL)
* IFT (Information for Tenderers) Drawings for Wharf Reconstruction at Lushes Bight (NL)

### Tender Submission

Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Canada Business Network website by September 15, 2022, at 1:00 PM (NST). The site is open Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 4:30 PM (NST).

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Kimberly Walker, Contracting Officer
Fisheries and Oceans Canada
20 Kent Street, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6
 Phone: (819) 953-8987
 Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
